questions.question_text: Which command can you enter to verify that a 128-bit address is live and responding?
What is the correct routing match to reach 172.16.1.5/32?

discussion.content: Longest prefix match would be answer
longest prefix will match, hence the /26

questions.question_text: Which two commands correctly verify whether port security has been configured on port FastEthernet 0/12 on a switch? (choose two)

choices.B: SW1# show swithport port-secure interface FastEthernet 0/12

discussion.content: letter C also correct LOL. Same info as Letter E

questions.question_text: Which condition does the err-disabled status indicate on an Ethernet interface?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: E
Port security has disabled the interface.
There is no image on this question

comments.content: When there's duplex mismatch, you'll notice link going up and down but no err-disable state, port-security can put the port into err-disable if security conditions are violated, as well as bpduguard but that's not between the options.

discussion.content: Can someone explain why E is the answer to this question...my understanding the answer should be A

choices.E: Port security has disabled the interface.
choices.D: The interface is configured with the shutdown command.
choices.B: The device at the other end of the connection is powered off.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
It supports EAP authentication for connecting to wireless networks.

choices.A: It supports EAP authentication for connecting to wireless networks.
choices.C: Device-administration packets are encrypted in their entirety.
choices.D: It ensures that user activity is fully anonymous.
